On Wed, Oct 8, 2008 at 9:16 AM, yosefshariat <yosefshariat@...> wrote:
> Of course I won't to use a "try catch" but I used a method which be
> like an "expected" in @Test

Yosef,

A similar request was made recently.  @Theory
@Test(expected=ExceptionName.class) should do it, but may be broken in
JUnit 4.5.  Can you log a bug, and meanwhile workaround with try and
catch?  Thanks,

   David Saff
